sentences.en: Activists stepped up their demands for local autonomy last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月激进分子对地方自治的呼声更高了。

sentences.en: Fifteen-year-old Danny is on the run from a local authority home.
sentences.cn: 15岁的丹尼从地方当局的收容所逃跑了。

sentences.en: Global ecological efforts can easily be at odds with local ecologies.
sentences.cn: 全球性生态保护工作很可能会和地方生态系统存在矛盾。

sentences.en: He was bailed to appear before local magistrates on 5 November.
sentences.cn: 他获得保释，将于11月5日在地方法庭出庭受审。

sentences.en: Local feeling does not necessarily concur with the press.
sentences.cn: 当地人的感受未必与媒体一致。

sentences.en: Local news organizations are being criticized for sensationalizing the story.
sentences.cn: 当地的新闻机构因为对此事大肆渲染而备受指责。

sentences.en: Once at Elgin day-trippers visit a number of local sights.
sentences.cn: 一到达埃尔金，一日游的游客就参观了一些当地的风景名胜。

sentences.en: Ray will earn his keep on local farms while studying.
sentences.cn: 雷求学期间会在当地的农场干活赚取生活费。

sentences.en: She attended a cancer support group at her local hospital.
sentences.cn: 她参加了当地医院的癌症互助组。

sentences.en: The causes are a complex blend of local and national tensions.
sentences.cn: 原因很复杂，既有地方性冲突也有全国范围的紧张局势。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentences.en: They arrested the men and frog-marched them to the local police station.
sentences.cn: 他们逮捕了这些人，并把他们押送到当地警察局。

sentences.en: They drink bitter on draught in the local bar.
sentences.cn: 他们在当地的酒吧里喝桶装的苦啤酒。

sentences.en: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.cn: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

sentences.en: We asked one of the locals to recommend a restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我们请一位当地人推荐一家餐馆。

sentences.en: You should also make your views known to your local MP.
sentences.cn: 你也应该让本地议员了解你的观点。
